assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Ruchi Soya Industries Limited engages in processing of oil seeds and refining of crude oil for edible use in India. The company operates through Extractions, Vanaspati, Oils, Food Products, Wind Power Generation, and Others segments. The company provides various types of products and seeds, such as extraction of various types of seeds; Vanaspati, bakery fats, and table spreads; crude and refined oils; textured soya protein and soya flour, as well as soya flakes, grits, and Lecithin; and other products that include seeds, coffee, soap, fresh fruit bunch, seedling, plant and equipment, toiletry preparations, and castor seed, as well as oil meals and other value added products. It offers its products under the Nutrela, Mahakosh, Sunrich, Ruchi Star, and Ruchi Gold brand names. The company also generates electricity from the wind mills. It also exports its products to Vietnam, Japan, Indonesia, Malaysia, South Korea, Europe, the Middle East, Argentina, Australia, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cameroon, Canada, China, Congo, Egypt, Ethiopia, Fiji, France, Germany, Ghana, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, and internationally. Ruchi Soya Industries Limited was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Indore, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Ramji Lal Gupta
companyOfficers.title: VP of Corp. Planning, Compliance Officer & Company Sec.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Ashutosh Bhailal Rao LLB, MBA (Marketing)
companyOfficers.title: VP of Legal
